intra_panel_references.rule_description: IF 'Select the process type' is 'India' THEN value is 'DOM IN'; IF 'International' THEN value is 'INT'
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Not visible, IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT.

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Dropdown values filtered based on 'Account Group/Vendor Type' selection from reference table 1.3
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3.

intra_panel_references.rule_description: IF 'Account Group/Vendor Type' IN ['ZDES', 'ZDOM', 'ZRPV', 'ZONE'] THEN 'Domestic'; IF IN ['ZIMP', 'ZSTV', 'ZDAS'] THEN 'Import'
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Default behaviour is Invisible, If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

intra_panel_references.rule_description: IF 'Select the process type' is 'India' THEN Country='India' and non-editable; IF 'International' THEN Country is selectable dropdown
intra_panel_references.original_logic: If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown. For dropdown values will be Column 2 - Column 5 of reference table 1.1.

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Derived from Country selection using column 5 of table 1.1
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Derived from Country selection using column 2 of table 1.1
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Dropdown values filtered by 'Process Type' value ('DOM IN' or 'INT') as filter on column 1 of reference table 1.2
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Mobile number validation rules depend on 'Country' selection
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Mobile Number Validation based on the country selection

intra_panel_references.referenced_field: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?
intra_panel_references.rule_description: Visible AND Mandatory IF 'Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?' is 'Yes'; otherwise invisible and non-mandatory
intra_panel_references.original_logic: Make visible and Mandatory if "Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?" is Yes otherwise it should be invisible and non-mandatory.

dependency_chains.description: Select the process type drives multiple downstream field behaviors
Country selection drives derived fields for code and name
Account Group/Vendor Type drives group key and domestic/import classification

controlling_fields.field_name: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)?
Do you wish to add additional email addresses?

notes: Field 'Email ID' references 'Add the concerned Email Id' in its logic but this appears to be an error - it should reference 'Concerned email addresses?'
Several derived fields are marked as 'Not visible' suggesting they are hidden helper fields for system use
Mobile number fields are split into Domestic (India) and Import (Non-India) groups with separate controlling questions
